project_plan.name: Simple Text-Based Game in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a simple text-based game where the player can navigate through rooms, pick up items, view their inventory, and encounter challenges.

task.name: Set up the game environment and define the structure for rooms
Create the inventory system to pick up and display items
Implement challenges that the player can encounter
Write tests for navigation, inventory management, and challenge encounters
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
